errors.formattedMessage: contracts/Token.sol: Warning: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. errors.message: SPDX license identifier not provided in source file. Before publishing, consider adding a comment containing "SPDX-License-Identifier: <SPDX-License>" to each source file. Use "SPDX-License-Identifier: UNLICENSED" for non-open-source code. Please see https://spdx.org for more information.

documentation.text:
This function transfers tokens
It satisfies the logic requirement of 'anyone can transfer tokens'
The keyword 'external' modifies the function so it's ONLY callable from outside the contract
This function is read-only and returns the amount of tokens the account owns
